I will preface my review by saying that the premises themselves were great; a beautiful heritage building furnished very well. Benny was there to greet us and gave some great food recommendations. 

It all went downhill from there. Within an hour of arrival we sent Benny an SMS politely asking him to speak to his cleaner because the bathroom had not been cleaned at all from the previous guest. We even attached photo evidence of a large clump of hair on top of the shower drain, sticky stains on the bathroom floor and water/toothpaste stains on the mirror. 

Rather than offer to have the room cleaned while we were out at dinner, offer a discount, or even apologise, he responded with an sms simply saying the cleaner claims she cleaned the premises. As such, we resigned ourselves to the fact that we would simply have to manage with no bathroom and to request a part refund for the portion of the premises that was unusable during our stay.   

After our stay we requested a refund, at which point Benny became aggressive and began leveling all kinds of hurtful and untrue accusations at us; and our child (all things he did not mention prior to our request for a refund). We are clean, educated, well mannered people who have received positive reviews for all our air bnb stays. In fact, we received a good review from the host we stayed at the night before. 

In keeping an open mind and manage a degree of fairness, I invite you to assume that the experience we had with Benny was a one-off event. I am sure his property is usually clean, and perhaps the cleaner just cut corners this one time, and Benny is usually in a less hostile mood.
